name: Cobalt Iron
overview: Cobalt Iron delivers full-featured business backup, hardware, software, and managed services, all for a monthly fee. This provides the flexibility for customers to have Cobalt Iron expand data protection services as a customer’s business grows. With Cobalt Iron, customers immediately take advantage of the most current storage technologies including deduplication, node replication, tiered storage, support for virtual machines, and item-level restores. The Cobalt Iron web interface allows customers the flexibility to control their data protection from anywhere. Customers can optionally off-site data to the Cobalt Iron Protection Center eliminating the cost of tape and tape management to further increase savings.
